Texts.Eng: It should be noted that bees have a natural predator: ^orange;Mites^reset;. These parasites infest your apiaries from time to time, and reduce their productivity and can even kill the bees. Create an ^orange;anti-mite frame^reset; to combat them.

Texts.Chs: 这类巢框，它能把瓦螨^orange;杀死或者赶跑^reset;，如果你好好地使用它们，瓦螨将会彻底从你的蜂园消失！我已经没有养蜂知识教你了，剩余的就要靠你亲自领悟了，祝你好运。
Texts.Eng: Simply placing this in an apiary will work its magic. ^orange;Mites hate these things^reset; and will be killed or driven off by them. Keep some handy. That's all I can teach you. The rest is in your able hands. Good luck!
